subject: ATTENTION  BENEFICIARY ,
body:
ATTENTION  BENEFICIARY ,
 I AM INSPECTOR KWESI BOATENG OF THE BNI (BUREAU OF NATIONAL
INTELLIGENCE) ,I HAVE BEEN APPOINTED JUST RECENTLY BY THE UNITED
NATIONS/GHANAIAN GOVERNMENT OPERATION KEEP GHANA INTERNATIONAL DIGNITY
CLEAN .
THIS IS IN REGARDS WITH THE SCAM ACTIVITIES BEEN CARRIED OUT BY SOME
UNLAWFUL GHANAIAN WHICH THE LAW WILL SOON CATCH UP WITH.
 YOUR FILE CONTAINING YOUR FULL NAMES AND YOUR TELEPHONE NUMBER WAS
GIVEN TO ME BY MY SUPERIORS TO MAKE SURE THAT I CARRY OUT ALL THE
NECESSARY INVESTIGATIONS TO IF POSSIBLE ARREST ALL THE PERPETRATORS
AND MAKE SURE THAT ALL THE MONEY YOU HAVE SENT TO GHANA IN RESPECT OF
THE BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS YOU ARE HAVING HERE WITH SOME PEOPLE SHOULD
BE REFUNDED TO YOU AND WITH A COMPENSATION FUNDS BEEN AWARDED TO YOU
BY THE WORLD BANK / UNITED NATIONS IN COLLABORATION WITH THE GHANAIAN
GOVERNMENT ATTACHED TO THIS E-MAIL IS YOUR COMPENSATION FUNDS APPROVAL
CERTIFICATE,AS WELL AS MY WORKING IDENTITY CARD.
I AM ONCE AGAIN ADVISING YOU THAT YOU KEEP THIS CONFIDENTIAL UNTIL I
AM ABLE TO FINISH WITH MY INVESTIGATIONS HERE AND MAKE SURE THAT ALL
YOUR FUNDS ARE BEEN WIRED BACK TO YOU THIS WILL INCLUDE YOUR
COMPENSATION MONEY AMOUNTING TO $12.5 MILLION USD.SO I WILL WANT YOU
TO REPLY TO THIS E-MAIL BY SENDING TO ME ALL RECEIPT OF THE WESTERN
UNION MONEY TRANSFER YOU HAVE SENT TO GHANA AND ANY DOCUMENT YOU WERE
SENT BY THE PEOPLE YOU HAVE BEEN SENDING THE MONEY TO IF YOU STILL
HAVE THEM WITH YOU,BUT IF YOU ARE NOT HAVING THEM I DO NOT HAVE A
PROBLEM WITH THAT,JUST REPLY TO LET ME KNOW.
I WILL BE SENDING TO YOU A FORM YOU WILL HAVE TO FILL AND RETURN BACK
TO ME FOR OFFICIAL USAGE AND ALSO I WILL BE SENDING TO YOU MY
IDENTITIES IMMEDIATELY AFTER YOU HAVE REPLIED TO THIS E-MAIL AND ALSO
ATTACHED TO THIS E-MAIL IS THE IDENTITY CARD OF THE ACCESS BANK UNITED
KINGDOM CEO,THAT IS THE BANK WHERE YOUR COMPENSATION FUNDS ARE
CURRENTLY DEPOSITED.
I WANT YOU TO KNOW THAT IF THERE IS ANYTHING YOU DO NOT UNDERSTAND AND
NEED TO KNOW,DON'T HESITATE TO ASK WHEN REPLYING TO THIS MAIL OKAY.
I DO HOPE THAT YOU UNDERSTAND THIS E-MAIL VERY WELL AND REPLY
IMMEDIATELY AFTER READING THIS MAIL..
WARMEST REGARDS,
INSPECTOR KWESI BOATENG
HEAD OF OPERATIONS BNI

subject: Re:    ATTENTION  BENEFICIARY ,
body:
Hello Inspector Kwesi Boateng,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your efforts in maintaining the dignity of Ghana and ensuring that justice is served. It's comforting to know that there are people like you working hard to protect innocent individuals.

I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message, though. Could you please clarify what exactly the "business" is that you mentioned? Also, could you explain more about these funds from the World Bank and United Nations?

As for the receipts and documents, I'm afraid I don't have any at hand right now. However, I'd be happy to assist in any way possible without those.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: ATTENTION BENEFICIARY ,TREAT AS URGENT
body:
Dear Mary,
Thanks for your honest  reply to my notification email which the content is
quite understood by me,well i want you to know that not having the receipts
and other legal documents available at this time is not a problem,as for
the compensation funds,funds are deposited here with the Ghana Commercial
bank Plc Accra Ghana for further transfers to beneficiaries overseas which
you are lucky to be part of.Importantly i will want you to know that there
is a form i will need to send to you which you will then print out ,fill
accordingly scan and return back to me,that filled form will be sent to the
police headquarters for signing and further sent to the High Court of
Justice for final endorsement before it will be sent to the bank to show
you as the certified and genuine beneficiary for them to be able to contact
you for a possible transfer of your funds to your choice nominated
account.I will be waiting for your urgent reply to this email so the form
can be sent to you and we progress very quickly as well.
Regards,
Inspector Kwesi

subject: Re: ATTENTION BENEFICIARY ,
body:
Dear Mary,
Good morning,still waiting for you to reply to the last email sent to you
yesterday,your quick response will be appreciated.
Inspector Kwesi

subject: Re: ATTENTION BENEFICIARY ,
body:
Hello Inspector Kwesi,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry, but I don't seem to recall the details of the last email you mentioned. Could you please refresh my memory about what it was regarding? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: THE EMAIL SENT AGAIN
body:
Dear Mary,
Thanks for your honest  reply to my notification email which the content is
quite understood by me,well i want you to know that not having the receipts
and other legal documents available at this time is not a problem,as for
the compensation funds,funds are deposited here with the Ghana Commercial
bank Plc Accra Ghana for further transfers to beneficiaries overseas which
you are lucky to be part of.Importantly i will want you to know that there
is a form i will need to send to you which you will then print out ,fill
accordingly scan and return back to me,that filled form will be sent to the
police headquarters for signing and further sent to the High Court of
Justice for final endorsement before it will be sent to the bank to show
you as the certified and genuine beneficiary for them to be able to contact
you for a possible transfer of your funds to your choice nominated
account.I will be waiting for your urgent reply to this email so the form
can be sent to you and we progress very quickly as well.
Regards,
Inspector Kwesi

subject: Re: ATTENTION BENEFICIARY ,
body:
Dear Mary,
I have resent you the email and still waiting for your response
Inspector Kwesi
